quote: Words used to attract the dull of wit are not to be relied on. – Huang Po
fact: Pamela Anderson Lee is Canada`s Centennial Baby, being the first baby born on the centennial anniversary of Canada`s independence.
joke: Nurse: Doctor, there's a patient that says he's invisible. Doctor: Well, tell him I can't see him right now!
